lead_paragraph: Mike Reid and Mark McNulty shot six-under-par 66s to shared the first-round lead in The Tradition, the Champion Tour’s fourth major of the year. David Edwards was a stroke back at the Crosswater Golf Club in Sunriver, Ore.
